messages.nikita_loginov_feedback: Thanks to GMentor for such a wonderful curriculum and for your help in achieving my goals!
messages.sergey_berezin_feedback: I am very grateful to your team for helping me fill the gaps in my knowledge. You helped me a lot.
messages.ignat_gaskarov_feedback: You helped me understand how I can achieve my goal of starting my own business.
messages.people_feedback: Feedback from people who have already graduated from us
messages.want_to: Do you want to get a job as a programmer? Or improve your skills?
messages.only_for_you: From 0 to the first salary in the shortest possible time!
messages.individual_plan_for_you: Our mentors will create a learning plan for you according to your knowledge and preferences. You no longer need to listen to what you have already heard 10 times. We give only the knowledge you need to achieve your goal.
messages.short_path: The shortest path to the target
messages.learn_what_you_need: You will only learn what is needed to achieve your goal. Focus and quality of presentation are our main strengths.
messages.individual_plan: With an individual program and your curriculum, you don't waste your budget on information you don't need.
messages.focus_program: A focused program will allow you to reach your goal as quickly and as conveniently as possible.
messages.our_mentors: Our mentors will try to explain even the most difficult things in a language you can understand.
messages.buy_ticket: Buy a ticket to the future
messages.individual_education: Individual training. Only the best. We will help
messages.subscribe: Sign up for a preliminary interview and receive our news
messages.we_will_contact: Thank you! We will contact you as soon as possible
messages.personal_dev: Prepare a personal plan that's right for you
messages.we_know_how_to_teach: Accompaniment all the way to your first salary and even more
messages.please_email_valid: Please enter a valid email address.
